Note: The training is structured as:
Week one will consist of classroom training from 08:00 until 04:00. A copy of the NERC book will be
issued on the first day of class. Planned for Monday through Friday.
Week two NERC sample test will be taken. This will be performed in a classroom
setting with one practice test a day for a duration of 2-3 hours.
You will then report to your work station.
A large amount of information will be covered in a short time. To make the most of our classroom
time together please eat and use the restroom before leaving the house since there will not be any
scheduled breaks for such time consuming activities.Thanks for your support on this matter.
